title: IBM Cloud Kubernetes Service
introduction: Explore the capabilities of IBM Cloud Kubernetes Service and discover the tools to automate, isolate, secure, manage, and monitor your workloads.

section_recommended.title: See what's new
section_recommended.description: Read about the latest changes to IBM Cloud Kubernetes Service.

section_recommended.title: Understand IBM Cloud Kubernetes Service
section_recommended.description: Review frequently asked questions and key technologies that IBM Cloud Kubernetes Service uses.

section_recommended.title: Get started with Kubernetes
section_recommended.description: Use the IBM Cloud console and the Kubernetes dashboard to create a cluster and deploy your first containerized app.

section_recommended.title: Plan your environment
section_recommended.description: Plan a highly available cluster with capacity for app workloads.

section_recommended.title: Create a cluster
section_recommended.description: Create a cluster according to your planned setup.

section_recommended.title: Add storage
section_recommended.description: Plan and add highly available persistent storage for your app data.
